QuestData.Title: A Favor for Melithar
QuestData.Description: You should speak with Melithar. I believe he had some troubles with the grell already.$B$BI expect he can offer you a well needed place to store more of your goods should you aid him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Melithar Staghelm in Shadowglen.
QuestData.RewardText: Ilthalaine sent you? He was wise to do so. I am indeed in need of help.
